review: Love it!!!!  Easy to hook it up and menu navigation is easy too.  I highly recommend the Fire TV stick to anyone who is tired of watching their tablet/laptop
author: Kate

review: Came 2 days late and it missed vacation which I bought it for.  Works great.
author: Kindle Customer

review: So simple to hook up, tons of movies free with Prime, there is even a app to connect my phone.  I really like this stick and tell everyone about it.
author: bj

review: Perfect movie player with kodi! I love it!
author: Jaewon Kim

review: Sucks, BUFFERS ALL THE TIME. I bought this because of all the good reviews, but this thing is terrible. It tells me I've got a great connection, but it will buffer on any app after a few minutes. I've got a great isp. No problems with any other device.
author: DuneJeep

review: I wold give the stick 5 stars except for all the activation drove us nuts!!!!!  In general it is an awesome device.
author: M Carol Jernigan

review: Awesome. No need for movie channels.
author: Cynthia Bloyd

review: Does not allow for a strong wifi single. I have supper fast download speed but when on wifi it says good to fair.
author: Droid
